title: Task 1: Describe form, style, materials, technique, or content.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one technique used in the creation of the Greek vase.
Response accurately describes one technique used in the creation of the Greek vase.
Response accurately describes two techniques used in the creation of the Greek vase.

title: Task 2: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, or content shape the work.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately use one example of specific visual evidence to explain how one technique was used to present imagery.
Response accurately uses one example of specific visual evidence to explain how one technique was used to present the imagery.

title: Task 3: Explain how the work demonstrates continuity or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately explain how the techniques are typical of Greek vase painting during the fifth century B.C.E.
Response does accurately explain how the techniques are typical of Greek vase painting during the fifth century B.C.E.
